text: Orna Porat (), born as Irene Klein, (June 6, 1924 â€“ August 6, 2015) was an German-born Israeli theater actress. She attended drama school and began her stage career at a repertory theater in Schleswig. She moved to Mandatory Palestine in 1946, and converted to Judaism in 1957. Porat died at the age of 91 on August 6, 2015.www.ynetnews.com ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Converts to Judaism Category:German stage actors Category:Israeli stage actors Category:Jewish Israeli actors Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:Actors from Cologne
